parameters: Man: W-What?! How did you get in?!

Man: Huh? What am I doing here? Can't you tell
just by looking? I'm making a game.

Man: What kind of game are you making? Umm, I
can't say that...

Male: Huh? You really want me to tell you...?
Hmm...

Man: ...Then, can you promise me that you won't
tell anyone else?

Man: If you're going to say it like that, I guess
there's no helping it...

Man: The game I'm making now is a school-themed
one. I want people to experience various aspects
of youth through this game.

Man: Anyway, it's surprising to hear about the
game I'm making even in a place like this...

Man: You must really love games, playing them
thoroughly from corner to corner and noticing even
the smallest details.

Man: If we have a chance, I would like you to play
my next work.

Male: Oops, it became a long conversation. I also
have to continue with the production, so goodbye.

Male: I'll say it one last time, but this
conversation is our secret. Please don't share it
on social media or anything.
